text: Dracula is one of the main antagonists of Marvel Comics. He is Marvel's incarnation of the legendary lord of all vampires by author Bram Stoker, changed somewhat so as to fit in with the super-heroic themes of Marvel. He was notable for being the titular protagonist of Tomb of Dracula and Dracula Lives and the main antagonist of the Blade franchise. He is usually the main villain of vampire related and supernatural characters stories and one of the arch-enemies of Blade as well as a foe for the Avengers, Midnight Sons and X-Men, and other villains like Doctor Doom and Apocalypse. == Other websites == * Dracula (Marvel) Category:Marvel Comics characters Category:Marvel Comics supervillains
title: Dracula (Marvel Comics)
